attributes.action: Halt the ban on the xl Bully for mental health & welfare reasons.
attributes.additional_details: Review the impact of putting the ban in place and being aware about the consequences for such. The mental health and wellbeing of people who have had to euthanise or give up their pet. The people who have non xl dogs and effected and the fact it not helping the most vulnerable and the dogs themselves are still being dumped or abused with no effect other than the ban in place. Address the actual problem and stop bad breeding and review the situation of irresponsible owners not affected by the ban
attributes.background: Stop the ban on the xl bully or  accordingly at once. Effecting animal welfare and mental health. Need to raise the issues on the impact caused & needs a review now.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474

Review and reform arrangements for ban on XL Bully type dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652260
